name: Jump thief
description:
Author:

JAKUB PATEREK

Translator:

TYMON WOLNIEWICZ

Graphic:

Studio BlackSpire

Music:

Aleksander Nakarada

You play as a bouncy thief who tries to steal baron's valuable treasure. There are a lot of various locations in game that differ in mechanics. It's a really challanging platform game with 36 levels to discover!
